text: Larisa Ilinichna Volpert (30 March 1926 – 1 October 2017 Умерла Лариса Ильинична Вольперт // Postimees, 1.10.2017. ) was a Soviet-Russian chess Woman Grandmaster and Soviet-Russian-Estonian philologist of Jewish descent. She was three times Soviet women's chess champion (1954, 1958, and 1959). She earned the Woman International Master title in 1954 and the Woman Grandmaster title in 1977. Volpert was born in Leningrad and died in Tallinn, Estonia at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Soviet academics Category:Estonian scientists Category:Jewish sportspeople Category:Jewish writers Category:Russian chess players Category:Russian Jews Category:Soviet chess players Category:Soviet writers Category:Writers from Saint Petersburg
